naslov: Vila sa tri luksuzna apartmana, prvi red do mora –  Seget Vranjica (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u ekskluzivnoj prodaji luksuzne novo uređene vile sa tri apartmana od koji svaki ima zaseban ulaz i parking. Obzirom da je vila prvi red do mora iz svakog apartmana se pruža prekrasan pogled na more. Plaža je odmah ispod objekta. Kompletno uređenje interijera je u tijeku i biti će gotovo do 4.mjeseca 2024. Opis apartmana: Prizemlje – veliki dnevni boravak sa blagovaonom i kuhinjom, spavaća soba, velika terasa, kupatilo i wc. Prvi kat – dnevni boravak sa blagovaonom i kuhinjom, tri spavaće sobe, dvije terase, kupatilo i dva wc-a. Potkrovlje – veliki dnevni boravak sa blagovaonom i kuhinjom, dvije spavaće sobe, praonica, dva balkona, kupatilo i wc. Lokacija ove nekretnine je u prekrasnom dijelu malog mjesta Seget Vranjica sa prekrasnim plažama i čistim morem, a na udaljenosti od Trogira svega 6km, do aerodroma 12km i do Splita 30km. Namjena ove vile je za elitni turizam i kao takva je odlična investicija za povrat uloženih sredstava. Ova nekretnina će biti spremna za booking sljedeću sezonu. Vlasništvo je uredno. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt:  091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Villa with three luxurious apartments, first row to the sea - Seget Vranjica We mediate in the exclusive sale of a luxurious newly arranged villa with three apartments, each of which has a separate entrance and parking. Considering that the villa is the first row to the sea, every apartment has a wonderful view of the sea. The beach is right below the building. Complete interior decoration is underway and will be finished by the 4th of March 2024. Apartment description: Ground floor - large living room with dining room and kitchen, bedroom, large terrace, bathroom and toilet. First floor – living room with dining room and kitchen, three bedrooms, two terraces, bathroom and two toilets. Attic - large living room with dining room and kitchen, two bedrooms, laundry room, two balconies, bathroom and toilet. The location of this property is in a beautiful part of the small town of Seget Vranjica with beautiful beaches and clear sea, and only 6 km from Trogir, 12 km from the airport and 30 km from Split. The purpose of this villa is for elite tourism and as such it is an excellent investment for the return of invested funds. This property will be ready for booking next season. The property is neat. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: +385915615115 ŽELJANA
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
